channel.title: Comments on: Episode #21: Call for Papers

item.title: By: Corey
item.dc:creator: Corey
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-21/#comment-204">Swain</a>.
We of course mean it is the first in the Bitcoin and cryptocurrency space. Let us know what we said that lead you to think we meant otherwise, because thinking this is the first peer-reviewed journal ever is pretty ridiculous, especially coming from the mouth of a PhD in science (myself).
I'm pretty sure the text herein, as well as the episode do not reflect that idea, but let us know if you think it does, and specifically where, so we can address it.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Swain.

We of course mean it is the first in the Bitcoin and cryptocurrency space. Let us know what we said that lead you to think we meant otherwise, because thinking this is the first peer-reviewed journal ever is pretty ridiculous, especially coming from the mouth of a PhD in science (myself).

I’m pretty sure the text herein, as well as the episode do not reflect that idea, but let us know if you think it does, and specifically where, so we can address it.

item.title: By: Swain
item.dc:creator: Swain
item.description: Ledger is *NOT* the first peer reviewed academic scholarly journal as stated above, and certainly not even the first to be published online. Perhaps the first published in this area of study.....
item.content:encoded: Ledger is *NOT* the first peer reviewed academic scholarly journal as stated above, and certainly not even the first to be published online. Perhaps the first published in this area of study…..

item.title: By: artstateofmind@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: artstateofmind@gmail.com
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/episode-21/#comment-7">Barb</a>.
Thank you so much, Barb. We have another new episode coming at you this week!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Barb.

Thank you so much, Barb. We have another new episode coming at you this week!

item.title: By: Barb
item.dc:creator: Barb
item.description: Thanks so much for this everyone!
